title: Break Down The Bar (feat. Brian Scolaro)
description:
A video of a naked lady trashing a bar sparks discussion on how Jay and Dan would go about it themselves and Brian Scolaro tells the gang how his advice may have ruined a life.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM

#CrackleCrackle
